page.title: 18AYLESFORD INDUSTRY
page.content: We discovered nearly all Companies stored goods on the site in large warehouses as a staging post for nationwide distribution.Only 4 Companies exported.Diversity of companies range from food and household goods to double glazing,obviously a growth industry.Seven out of eighteen companies were entirely British,all the others having some foreign interst.Only 3 companies offered facilities for sports and social activities.However,it should be pointed out that one company completely outstripped others in size,and scope and numbers employed,by many times.This particular company Safeway,offered all social benefits and pension schemes that would be expected of a Multi-National Company.
